other_tests.findings: Peak ACTH levels were adequate after stimulation.
Hypointense lesion in the anterior pituitary consistent with a microadenoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 6 yr, 8 months, the hypointensity was confirmed, appearing consistent with an enlarged anterior pituitary size.

other_tests.findings: Moderate fasciculation potentials and occasional fibrillation potentials in the deltoid muscle suggestive of anterior horn cell dysfunction.
